original_title: ‘ICC Timber Solutions: Built to last, designed to impress’
original_body_lines: For over four decades, the International Construction Consortium (Pvt) Limited (ICC) has stood as a trusted leader in Sri Lanka’s construction industry, renowned for delivering projects on time with uncompromising quality. Building on this legacy, ICC Timber Solutions has emerged as a respected name in premium timber products, bringing warmth, durability, and timeless style to both residential and commercial spaces.

As part of ICC’s diversified portfolio, ICC Timber Solutions offers expertly crafted timber elements that blend natural elegance with modern performance standards. At the forefront of its product range are ICC Prefinished Timber Flooring and ICC Timber Deck Tiles, two solutions that exemplify the company’s commitment to excellence.

Manufactured in Bandaragama, Sri Lanka, ICC Prefinished Timber Flooring uses the innovative ELASTILON DIY system, enabling quick and hassle-free installation without the complexities of traditional methods. These factory-finished planks guarantee consistent quality, reduced site work, and a sleek finish ideal for modern interiors. With sustainable sourcing, advanced treatments, and a production capacity of 10,000 square feet per month, ICC ensures durability, style, and long-lasting value.

For outdoor applications, ICC Timber Deck Tiles offer a fast, stylish upgrade for balconies, pool decks, and garden areas. Designed for easy installation, they withstand diverse weather conditions while retaining their aesthetic appeal, making them a preferred choice for homeowners and commercial developers alike.

Beyond flooring and decking, ICC Timber Solutions also produces Engineered Timber Doors, tailored to precise specifications using advanced fabrication techniques. These are particularly suited for large-scale projects, hotels, and residential developments where structural integrity and design consistency are key.

Sustainability is central to ICC Timber Solutions’ philosophy. All timber is responsibly sourced, and eco-friendly production processes minimise environmental impact while ensuring the highest product standards.
